★★ Are you looking for a CHEAP, RELIABLE, and HIGH QUALITY VPS Hosting Provider? ★★

★★ Are you tired of OVERPAYING your current hosting provider for a service that just isn't right? ★★

The solution is here!

GreenValueHost is the web hosting industry's #1 "budget premium" hosting provider, specializing in providing our clients with high quality and affordable hosting solutions in 4 of our world class data center locations (Buffalo, Chicago, Dallas, and Los Angeles).

We are a privately owned hosting company (Green Value Hosting, Inc) registered in the U.S. state of Illinois since October, 2012. We host tens of thousands of websites from thousands of clients around the world, and we would love to have the opportunity of serving you!

To kick off the SPRING SEASON, we are launching a few limited time only promotions for both new and existing customers on all new VPS hosting purchases!

Special Offer 1: SAVE 30% OFF RECURRING on ANY FULLY MANAGED VPS HOSTING PLAN on ANY BILLING TERM
